responses: Hello! How can I assist you with your health today?
Hi there! How can I help you stay healthy?
Age is just a number, but I am a creation of the latest technology.
Regular exercise is important! You can try cardio exercises like running or cycling, strength training like weight lifting, and flexibility exercises like yoga.
A balanced diet includes a variety of foods from all the food groups: fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, whole grains, and low-fat dairy. Remember to stay hydrated!

Managing stress is important! Try activities like meditation, deep breathing exercises, regular physical activity, and ensuring you get enough sleep. Talking to someone you trust can also be very helpful.
